sentences: Mina, sa ja ta aitame koos 체lesannete lahendamisel.
Aitame sinu 천nnetusjuhtumit arhiividokumentide p천hjal kindlaks teha.
context: The word 'aitame' is the first person plural form of the verb 'aita', which means to help. It can be used in both indicative and imperative mood depending on context.
